page.title: 06Cathedral Choir, Hereford.
page.content: The{Choristers}sing at 3 services on Sundays;the 10 a.m.Eucharist,11 a.m. Mattins and 3.30 p.m.Evensong. During the week they sing 5.30.p.m.Evensong. They practise from 8.25 to 9.15 in the morning. In the afternoon they have Choristers' tea at 4.p.m. and practise from 4.40 to 5.15. The{Organist,}who is the Choirmaster,takes the practice. The Choristers do the same school work as the other pupils. Quite a few of them are boarders at the Hereford Cathedral Prep. School. The{Head Chorister}is responsible for the discipline of the Choristers. He wears a special badge on a red ribbon with crystals set in the middle and the{Dean's Crest.}It says Head Chorister on it.
